events.message: We have received the application from the candidate who is interested in the software engineer position.
The candidate's profile has been categorised under the engineering department based on their skills and experience.
A recruiter has been assigned to handle the candidate's application moving forward in the hiring process.
The candidate completed an initial screening call focusing on their background in software development and problem-solving skills.
The candidate responded positively to the screening feedback and expressed enthusiasm about moving forward.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the candidate to assess their coding skills and software engineering knowledge.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview demonstrating strong coding abilities and system design understanding.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidateâ€™s fit within the company culture and benefits package.
The HR interview was completed with positive feedback regarding the candidate's communication skills and team alignment.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate including details on compensation, benefits, and start date.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and requested clarification on a few benefits.
The candidate has formally accepted the job offer and is excited to join the engineering team.
Onboarding process has started with the candidate completing initial training modules and setup.
The hiring process for the software engineer position has been successfully closed with the candidate fully onboarded.
